course_title: ACA/ACP Cloud Computing Exam Preparation Tips
description: This course introduces useful tips about Cloud Computing Certification Exam, which can help you prepare better and pass easily

course_title: From Zero To VPN Gateway In 20 Minutes
description: Learn how you can quickly and easily create managed VPC Gateways and attach them to your Alibaba Cloud VPC Groups, allowing easy, secure access via SSL or IPsec VPN tunnels. VPN Gateways make it easy to establish a private connection to any Alibaba Cloud VPC group, in any Region.

course_title: Alibaba Cloud Computing Fundamentals
description: This free fundamental course aims to support you getting started with Alibaba Cloud Computing with your free trial program. In this course, You will learn the basics of Alibaba Cloud Computing and how to start with the key products of Alibaba Cloud Computing. This course also offers free certification after each topic. Start your Alibaba Cloud journey today!

course_title: Database Migration End To End Demo
description: N/A

course_title: PolarDB And DTS Introduction
description: N/A

course_title: Database Migration Special Tool: ADAM Introduction
description: N/A

course_title: Overview Of Database Migration To Alibaba Cloud Solution
description: N/A

course_title: Learn How To Migrate And Back-Up Data With Hybrid Backup Recovery
description: Learn how Hybrid Backup Recovery allows you to back up data stored in Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances, Apsara File Storage NAS, Object Storage Service (OSS), on-premises data centers, and VMware virtual machines. Understand how Hybrid Backup Recovery also allows you to migrate data from VMware virtutal machines to Alibaba Cloud in this e-learning course.

course_title: Introduction To Alibaba Cloud EIP And Premium EIP
description: Learn how public IP address resources can be bound and dynamically unbound to Alibaba Cloud VPC-type ECS instances, NAT gateway, and Intranet Server Load Balancer, meeting the needs for flexible management.

course_title: E-Commerce Website Migration Best Practices
description:
In this hands-on best practices video, learn how to quickly and painlessly migrate a website onto Alibaba Cloud.

Using a combination of Linux command line tools and Alibaba Cloud's database migration service, DTS, we show you how you can take a simple example site (built with WordPress) and fully migrate it to Alibaba Cloud.

course_title: Alibaba Cloud ApsaraDB For PolarDB Technical Essentials
description:
ApsaraDB for PolarDB is a cloud-native relational database compatible with MySQL, PostgreSQL, and Oracle. 

ApsaraDB for PolarDB provides the performance and availability of traditional enterprise databases and the flexibility and cost-effectiveness of open-source databases.

By learning this online course, you will not only get familiar with Alibaba Cloud database products portfolio but also know most of the technical features PolarDB will provide.

We also provide comprehensive operation demo including cluster creation, endpoints management, system monitoring, etc. for your hands-on reference.

course_title: Bring A Microservice App To Managed Kubernetes In 10 Minutes
description: N/A

course_title: End-To-End Demo Of CI/CD With Alibaba Cloud Container Service
description: This online learning course provides a fundamental DevOps best practices guide on Alibaba Cloud. In this guide, you will understand the best practices on how to implement the continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) on using the Container Service on Alibaba Cloud.

course_title: A Demo To Install Flask App On ECS
description: N/A

course_title: A Demo To Alibaba Cloud Short Message Service
description: Alibaba Cloud's Short Message Service provides the APIs and SDK to developers to send messages all around the world. The system supports OTP (One-Time-Password), transaction notifications, push notifications and promotional campaigns as well as supports both domestic and international messaging. It covers the globe, Alibaba SMS provides convenient, efficient, and intelligent communication capabilities that help businesses quickly contact their customers.

course_title: How Alibaba Cloud Helps You Secure Your Web Services
description: N/A

course_title: A Demo For Deploying Stateful Tomcat By YAML Based On Alibaba Cloud Container Service
description: In this online course, you will learn how to deploy an application with Alibaba Cloud Container Service step by step including service setup, Config Maps setup, Secret setup, etc.

course_title: A Demo Of How To Use Function Compute HTTP Trigger
description: In this online course, you will learn how to configure Alibaba Cloud Function compute product using its embedded HTTP trigger, so that when request is sent to a particular URL, your predefined actions will be triggered automatically

course_title: Accomplish Performance Testing On Containerized Application
description: In this online course, you will learn some typical performance tuning and testing tools and know how to use them to quickly measure your docker instance performance

course_title: DevOps On Alibaba Cloud
description:
In this online course, you will learn some brief history of DevOps and understand how a well implemented DevOps practice can accelerate your business and product development. 

You will also learn the products Alibaba Cloud provides which will provide a total solution to your DevOps transformation incluing CodePipeline, Container Service, Terraform plugins, etc.

course_title: How To Quickly Setup Smart Access Gateway
description:
Smart Access Gateway (SAG) is an all-in-one solution for connecting local branches to the Alibaba Cloud. With Smart Access Gateway, enterprises can access Alibaba Cloud through the Internet using a fully encrypted connection, which offers greater benefits including a more intelligent, more reliable, and more secure network experience. 
 
Through this online demo you will learn how to setup SAG in a few minutes.

course_title: Alibaba Cloud Video Streaming Solution And Demo
description:
ApsaraVideo Live is a live streaming platform for both audio and video based on leading content hosting and delivery networks and large-scale distributed real-time transcoding technology.ApsaraVideo Live provides high-definition and uninterrupted live audio and video services that are convenient and accessible, with low latency and high concurrency.
 
In this demo video you will have an overview of ApsaraVideo Live Streaming solution and learn how to setup a video streaming platform step by step.

course_title: Provision Services In Alibaba Cloud With Terraform
description:
Terraform is an open-source tool for securely and efficiently provisioning and managing cloud infrastructure.
 
In this online course, you will learn Terraform basics and know how to automatically set up ECS/VCP/Security Group with a simple Terraform plan execution.

course_title: An End-To-End Demo Of Auto-Scaling Service
description:
Auto Scaling is a service to automatically adjust computing resources based on your volume of user requests. When demand for computing resources increase, Auto Scaling automatically adds ECS instances to serve additional user requests, or alternatively removes instances in the case of decreased user requests.
 
In this online course, you will understand key concepts of Auto-Scaling like scaling group, scaling task, etc. You will also be able to see an end-to-end demo of auto-scaling configuration

course_title: Use Simple Application Server To Deploy Wordpress Website
description:
Simple Application Server is a new generation computing service for stand-alone application scenarios. It provides one-click application deployment and supports all-in-one services such as domain name resolution, website publishing, security, O&M, and application management. This optimizes the user experience of setting up a simple application and makes it easier for entry-level users to use cloud computing products. 

In this online course, we will demonstrate how to setup wordpress website with domain name configured by using SAS in just a few clicks.

course_title: Setup Message Queue For Message Subscription And Consumption - Live Demo
description: Alibaba Cloud Message Queue (MQ) is a distributed message queue service independently developed by Alibaba and fully hosted on the Alibaba Cloud platform. It supports reliable message-based asynchronous communication among microservices, distributed systems, and serverless applications. This service can be used to easily create a scalable distributed system with loose coupling and high availability.

course_title: Build A Microservice Cluster On Alibaba Cloud Container Service - Live Demo
description:
Traditional applications contain a fixed number of services and service nodes are relatively fixed, so dynamic discovery is not required. Usually, service discovery finds services through DNS resolution or IP addresses. In cloud environments, the service quantity may change at any time, and service and listening nodes are unknown. Therefore, in cloud application microservice architectures, service discovery is an essential function. 

This live demo will show you how to setup a spring cloud based microservice cluster using helm on Alibaba Cloud Container service.

course_title: Implement Data Migration From Local Db To RDS With DTS - Live Demo
description:
Data Transmission Service (DTS) helps you migrate data between data storage types, such as relational database, NoSQL, and OLAP. The service supports homogeneous migrations as well as heterogeneous migration between different data storage types.

This demonstration session shows you how to use DTS to migrate a local database to RDS instance in Alibaba Cloud.

course_title: Deploy And Manage Applications With Container Service For Swarm
description: Alibaba Cloud container service supports both K8S cluster and Swarm cluster. In this learning course, we will show you how to deploy a Swarm cluster through container service and easily manage application on it

course_title: Dynamic Route For CDN - Live Demo
description:
This live demo explains the basic concepts and usage scenarios of Alibaba Cloud Dynamic Route for CDN (DCDN) and illustrates how to configure it properly.

DCDN caches and accelerates access to static and dynamic content via Alibaba Cloud’s Public Global Content Delivery Network and different network optimization techniques to find the most optimal route to the origin in real-time to and from our global edge node presences including mainland China, and more than 50 other worldwide locations.

course_title: Auto-Scaling With Alibaba Cloud K8S Service - Live Demo
description:
Container Service for Kubernetes enables business auto scaling based on traffic. This prevents traffic spikes from crashing your system and reduces the amount of idle resources.

In this demo, you will see how container capacity expansion be triggered within seconds after the business traffic has reached the threshold for capacity expansion.  Manual operations are not required for capacity scaling.  The container capacity will automatically shrink when the traffic reduces.

course_title: Live Demo - Implement Blue-Green Deployment With K8S
description:
Container Service for Kubernetes provides enterprise-level high-performance and flexible management of Kubernetes containerized applications throughout the application lifecycle. In this demo, you will see how to leverage a k8s cluster to deploy a web application and switch between 2 different deployment with only a few clicks.

To learn more about container service for k8s, please visit here: https://www.alibabacloud.com/product/kubernetes

We also have one related online clouder course can be found here:
https://edu.alibabacloud.com/certification/clouder_container

course_title: Global Acceletation - Live Demo (English)
description:
This live demo explains the basic concepts and usage scenarios of Alibaba Cloud Global Acceleration and illustrates how to configure it properly.

Global Acceleration enables cross-geographic access to cloud-based backend services over a public IP with minimal latency and minimal packet loss including mainland China.

course_title: A Quick Demo Of How To Easily Migrate Your Linux Server To Alibaba Cloud
description: In this demo video, we will show you how to use go2aliyun_client tool to migrate your Linux server to Alibaba Cloud with only a few necessary data configured.

course_title: Alibaba Cloud Storage Gateway - Live Demo
description:
Cloud Storage Gateway is a gateway service that can be deployed on-premises, or in the cloud, to provide a seamless and secure connection between on-premises IT infrastructure and cloud-based storage services at the back end, such as Alibaba Cloud Object Storage Service (OSS). Cloud Storage Gateway also supports industry standard file storage protocols and provides low latency data access by caching frequently accessed data locally.

In this video, we show how to use to configure Cloud Storage Gateway in Alibaba Cloud portal and in an on-premises environment. Cloud Storage Gateway will be used to backup local virtual machines into Object Storage Service.

course_title: Introduce Cloud Enterprise Network CEN And How To Configure It In 5 Minutes
description: Alibaba Cloud CEN is a service that allows you to create a global network for rapidly building a distributed business system with a hybrid cloud computing solution. Alibaba Cloud CEN enables you to build a secure, private, and enterprise-class interconnected network between VPCs in different regions and your local data centers. CEN provides enterprise-class scalability that automatically responds to your dynamic computing requirements.

course_title: Alibaba Cloud VPN Gateway - Live Demo
description:
Alibaba Cloud VPN  is an important security and management product. VPN is an Internet-based service that securely and reliably connect enterprise data centers, enterprise office networks or Internet terminals to Alibaba Cloud VPCs through encrypted channels. VPN Gateway supports both IPsec-VPN connection and SSL-VPN connection.

In this video we show how to use VPN Gateway to configure IPSec based site-to-site scenario, and SSL based point-to-site scenario across all client types (Android, iOS, Windows, Linux and macOS).

course_title: Alibaba Cloud Object Storage Service - Live Demo
description:
Alibaba Cloud Object Storage Service allows developers to store and process Terabytes of unstructured data in a cost-efficient, highly-available, and durable manner.

This live-demo webinar will give an overview about the concepts and puts a special emphasis on features that differentiate this offering from competitive offerings of other cloud providers.

For details about OSS Product, please access:
https://www.alibabacloud.com/product/oss

To Learn more about OSS Product, please access our online clouder course:
https://edu.alibabacloud.com/certification/clouder_oss

course_title: Understanding ECS Images (Demo)
description:
Alibaba Cloud Elastic Compute Service Image Import & Export video shows how to manage images. This live-demo webinar will give an overview about the platform, its UI, Image management use-cases, etc.

For details about ECS Product, please access:
https://www.alibabacloud.com/product/ecs

To Learn more about ECS Product, please access our online clouder course:
https://edu.alibabacloud.com/certification/clouder_cloudserver

course_title: Building Global Networks On Alibaba Cloud (English)
description: In this live-demo we will connect an on-premises network through a VPN-Gateway (https://www.alibabacloud.com/product/vpn-gateway) and IPSec respectively with Alibab Cloud’s Cloud Enterprise Network (https://www.alibabacloud.com/product/cen) with a region in Mainland China with low latency and nearly zero packet loss

course_title: Building Live Streaming Platform In Alibaba Cloud - Live Demo
description:
ApsaraVideo Live is a live video and audio broadcasting platform based on leading content distribution and large-scale distributed real time transcoding technology. The product provides high-definition and smooth live audio and video services that can be conveniently accessed, with low latency and high concurrency.

In this video, we will show you how to build an elastic live streaming platform in a few minutes upon Alibaba Cloud.

For details about ApsaraVideo Live Product, please access:
https://www.alibabacloud.com/product/apsaravideo-for-live

course_title: Isolated Network Environment With VPC
description: The Alibaba Cloud Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) Introduction course is designed to provide you with the fundamental knowledge to plan, configure and administer Alibaba Cloud VPC. In this course we will discuss deployment best practices and use cases of isolated network environment based on Alibaba Cloud VPC including customizing the IP address range, network segment, route table, and gateway. Additionally, you are introduced to various ways of connecting VPC to the Internet, such as using Network address translation (NAT) Gateway, Elastic IP Address (EIP), and Server Load Balancer (SLB).

course_title: Elastic High Performance Computing (E-HPC) Introduction And Demo
description:
To meet increasing demand for HPC capability, Alibaba Cloud offers Elastic High Performance Computing (E-HPC) as a HPCaaS public cloud service. Based on existing infrastructure, this product provides users with an all-in-one high-performance computing service cloud platform.

In this course, you will learn the E-HPC concept and how to use Alibaba Cloud E-HPC product.

For details about E-HPC Product, please access:
https://www.alibabacloud.com/product/ehpc​

course_title: Lab Demo For Disk Backup And Recovery
description: This is a step by step operations demonstration on how to use snapshot to do ECS data disk backup and recovery

course_title: Lab Demo For ECS Data Disk Resizing And System Disk Changing
description: This is a step by step operations demonstration on how to resize ECS data disk and change system disk

course_title: Lab Demo For Deploying Web Service On ECS
description: This is a step by step operations demonstration on how to quickly deploy web service using ECS

course_title: Lab Demo For VPC And Vswitch Creation
description: This is a step by step operations demonstration on how to create VPC and Vswitch with ECS connected to them

course_title: Lab Demo For SLB Configuration
description: This is a step by step operations demonstration on how to use Server Load Balancer (SLB) to realize web service HA.

course_title: Establish Global Connectivity Through Cloud Enterprise Netwrok
description:
This course is designed to help students familiarize themselves with the basic functions and features of Alibaba Cloud Enterprise Network products, and learn how to use the cloud enterprise network to quickly create a globally connected enterprise network on the cloud.

To learn more about this topic, see: https://www.alibabacloud.com/product/cen

course_title: Quickly Build A Wordpress Website Using Resource Template On The Cloud
description:
In this Clouder lesson, you will learn how to conveniently publish a WordPress website with a set of prescribed scripts using Alibaba Cloud ROS service.

To find out more detail about ROS, please access:
https://www.alibabacloud.com/product/ros

course_title: Create A New Cloud Disk And Assign It To Existing ECS Instance
description:
In this short video, we introduced how to create a new cloud disk and mount it to an existing ECS instance as the data disk.

To find out more detail about ECS, please access:
https://www.alibabacloud.com/product/ecs

course_title: Alibaba Cloud Message Service Introduction
description:
In this short video, we introduced what is Alibaba Cloud Message Service and how to send/receive message through the console.

To find out more detail about Message Service, please access:
https://www.alibabacloud.com/product/message-service

course_title: Build Your First Personal Website On Alibaba Cloud Using ECS
description:
In this short video, we introduced how to quickly deploy a personal website with Alibaba Cloud ECS and Marketplace service.

To find out more detail about ECS, please access:
https://www.alibabacloud.com/product/ecs

course_title: Cross Region OSS Replication With Function Compute
description:
How to easily achieve cross region data replication on Alibaba Cloud OSS? You’ll learn it in this short video with a quick demo.

To find out more detail about OSS & Function Compute, please access:
https://www.alibabacloud.com/product/oss
https://www.alibabacloud.com/product/function-compute

course_title: Load Balance ECS Instances Across Multiple Availability Zones
description:
In this short video, you’ll understand how to deploy Alibaba Cloud ECS & SLB to achieve multi-zone high availability architecture.

To find out more detail about ECS & SLB, please access:
https://www.alibabacloud.com/product/ecs
https://www.alibabacloud.com/product/slb

course_title: Why We Need Table Store
description: Table Store is a distributed NoSQL data storage service built on Alibaba Cloud's ApsaraDB distributed computing system, which comes with 99.99% high availability and 99.999999999% data reliability.

course_title: New Retail Introduction Series 3: Alibaba Cloud New Retail Solutions
description:
Welcome to watch Alibaba Cloud's new retail introduction series. Through this series of courses, you will learn about new retail-related concepts, user stories, and Alibaba Cloud's new retail-related solutions.

For details about Alibaba Cloud Retail Solution, please access:
https://www.alibabacloud.com/solutions/retail

course_title: New Retail Introduction Series 2: New Retail Cases
description:
Welcome to watch Alibaba Cloud's new retail introduction series. Through this series of courses, you will learn about new retail-related concepts, user stories, and Alibaba Cloud's new retail-related solutions.

For details about Alibaba Cloud Retail Solution, please access:
https://www.alibabacloud.com/solutions/retail​

course_title: New Retail Introduction Series 1: What's New Retail
description:
Welcome to watch Alibaba Cloud's new retail introduction series. Through this series of courses, you will learn about new retail-related concepts, user stories, and Alibaba Cloud's new retail-related solutions.

For details about Alibaba Cloud Retail Solution, please access:
https://www.alibabacloud.com/solutions/retail​

course_title: Big Data Basics
description:
Learn the basics of Big Data, including the major differences between traditional databases and common Big Data tools. See how Big Data systems are used to collect, store, and process data, and learn the differences between batch and streaming data processing tools.

After completing this course, you should be able to answer the following questions:

- What is Big Data?
- How are Big Data systems different from traditional databases?
- How did common Big Data tools such as Hadoop evolve? 
- What are the differences between batch and streaming data processing systems?

course_title: Accelerating Deep Learning Tasks With AIACC
description: Learn how Alibaba Cloud's AIACC can be used to accelerate popular open source deep learning tools like TensorFlow. In this demo, we show how speedups of 18-74% can be achieved without any changes to existing TensorFlow code. We demonstrate the power of AIACC using both the standard  MNIST handwritten digit dataset, as well as sample COVID-19 chest X-rays.

course_title: Realtime Data Analytics With DataHub
description: See how Alibaba Cloud's DataHub can be used to collect streaming data in real-time, and then pass that data along to other streaming data processing tools like Flink for further processing. This short course will show how data collected by DataHub can be passed on to Flink and finally used to generate a realtime data dashboard in DataV.

course_title: Train And Deploy Tensorflow Models With PAI-DSW And PAI-EAS
description: Learn how you can quickly and easily experiment with Machine Learning models in PAI-DSW, then deploy them as standalone API services using PAI-EAS.

course_title: Ham Or Spam? Identifying Spam Email With Alibaba Cloud's PAI
description:
Learn how to build a Naive Bayes spam classifier on Alibaba Cloud using Platform For AI (PAI)'s built-in Jupyter notebook interface, PAI DSW (Data Science Workshop). 
In this video, we go from 0 to a >95% accurate spam classifier in less than 20 minutes!

course_title: Image Search: The Machine Learning Technology Behind Alibaba E-Commerce
description: N/A

course_title: Operation Demonstration Of ElasticSearch
description: In this online course, will show you a demo about how to setup Alibaba Cloud Elasticsearch product so that learn how to configure reversed index and make massive log files searchable

description: Introduce the basic concepts of HBase, including the difference between HBase and RDBMS, Colume Family etc.

course_title: Alibaba Cloud Maxcompute Studio At A Glance - Live Demo
description:
MaxCompute (previously known as ODPS) is a general purpose, fully managed, multi-tenancy data processing platform for large-scale data warehousing. MaxCompute supports various data importing solutions and distributed computing models, enabling users to effectively query massive datasets, reduce production costs, and ensure data security.

This live-demo webinar will give an overview about the MaxCompute Studio interface by designing a MapReduce word count example.

For details about MaxCompute Product, please access:
https://www.alibabacloud.com/product/maxcompute

To Learn more about MaxCompute Product, please access our online clouder course:
https://edu.alibabacloud.com/certification/clouder_bigdata

course_title: Alibaba Cloud Machine Learning Platform - Live Demo
description:
Alibaba Cloud Machine Learning Platform for AI provides an all-in-one machine learning service featuring low user technical skills requirements, but with high performance results. On the Machine Learning Platform for AI, you can quickly establish and deploy machine learning experiments to achieve seamless integration between algorithms and your business.

This live-demo webinar will give an overview of the platform, its UI, how to create a workflow, how to train/evaluate the model, etc.

For details about Machine Learning Platform, please access:
https://www.alibabacloud.com/product/machine-learning

To Learn more about the real case of using Machine Learning Platform for PAI, please access our online clouder course:
https://edu.alibabacloud.com/certification/clouder_machinelearning

course_title: Alibaba Cloud Image Search In A Nutshell And Demo
description:
Alibaba Cloud Image Search is an intelligent image search service that helps users find similar or identical images. Based on machine learning and deep learning, the product enables end-users to take a screenshot or upload an image to search and find desired products and fulfill other search requests.

The product's search function is suitable for e-commerce websites and platforms, whereas the generic search feature is ideal for enabling searches on stock photography and photo-sharing sites.

More information of the product can be found from:
https://www.alibabacloud.com/product/imagesearch

course_title: Ten Minutes To Start Your BI Journey
description: Delivering analytic capabilities once reserved for professional analysts, Quick BI allows you to perform data analytics, exploration, and reporting on mass data with drag-and-drop features and a rich variety of visuals. Quick BI enables users to perform data analytics, exploration, and reporting, and empowers enterprise users to view and explore data and make informed, data-driven decisions.
